Name: Alien Secretion
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Lime green and fruity but all too drinkable, with a distinct bite despite its mild sweetness.
History: One of many 80s cocktails with a dodgy name.
Nutrition: One serving of Alien Secretion contains 245 calories
